mapper.update: UPDATE matching SET mat_title =#{mat_title}, mat_cont= #{mat_cont}, mat_st=#{mat_st}, mat_end=#{mat_end}, mat_bc=#{mat_bc}, mat_tc=#{mat_tc}, mat_allDay=#{mat_allDay}, mat_type=#{mat_type}, mem_id=#{mem_id} WHERE mat_id=#{mat_id}
UPDATE matching SET mat_del='Y' WHERE mat_id = #{mat_id}
mapper.select: select * from( SELECT B.*, rownum rn2 FROM (SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MAT_ST) AS rn FROM (SELECT MAT_ID,MAT_TITLE,MAT_CONT,SUBSTR (REPLACE(MAT_ST,'T',' '),1) MAT_ST, SUBSTR (REPLACE(MAT_END,'T',' '),1) MAT_END, MAT_TYPE,MEM_ID,CW_MEM_ID,MAT_DEL FROM MATCHING WHERE CW_MEM_ID = #{cw_mem_id} and to_date(SUBSTR (REPLACE(MAT_ST,'T',' '),1),'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi') <= to_date(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi'),'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi') ORDER BY MAT_ST DESC )A order by rn desc )B )c WHERE RN2 >= ( #{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND RN2<= #{page} * #{pageSize} order by rn2

select * from( SELECT B.*, rownum rn2 FROM (SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MAT_ST) AS rn FROM (SELECT MAT_ID,MAT_TITLE,MAT_CONT,SUBSTR (REPLACE(MAT_ST,'T',' '),1) MAT_ST, SUBSTR (REPLACE(MAT_END,'T',' '),1) MAT_END, MAT_TYPE,MEM_ID,CW_MEM_ID,MAT_DEL FROM MATCHING WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} and to_date(SUBSTR (REPLACE(MAT_ST,'T',' '),1),'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi') <= to_date(to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi'),'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:mi') ORDER BY MAT_ST DESC )A order by rn desc )B )c WHERE RN2 >= ( #{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND RN2<= #{page} * #{pageSize} order by rn2
